JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Looking for a job in Denmark? Mechanic for A.O. Materiel Udlejning in Fredericia
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have the necessary commitment and drive to be responsible for ensuring that the company´s equipment always is ready for rental?

We are searching for 2 mechanics to preparation of A.O. Materiel´s equipment. The customers are the best in the industry and therefore you will become an important part of the team. You will be part of delivering a high standard of service and all the time, you will be one step ahead to service the customers in the best way. 

Job profile

You will organize the assignments yourself, which will be: 

  • Troubleshooting, reparation, mainteneance and preparation of materiel – hydraulic, mechanical and electrical
  • Inspection and service of the equipment
  • Good customer service from start to finish 

Person profile 

  • You are educated contractor– or agricultural mechanic, truck mechanic or similar
  • You have a good sense for troubleshooting, and you work solution-oriented
  • You take initiative and reach out to solve the assignments
  • You are responsible and focus on the result
  • You have a high commitment, big drive and contributes to a good working environment

The company offers 

An exciting job with many challenges, where you can help influence your workday. The salary will reflect your qualifications and experience.

Further information/application 

If you need more information, you are welcome to contact Kim Frandsen, Skelmose at 0045 6014 8043 or kf@skelmose.eu.

Accession: As soon as possible

About A.O. Materiel Udlejning

You can read more about the company here: www.aomateriel.dk
